changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE project ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, login VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE cause ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project INT NOT NULL REFERENCES project(id), text VARCHAR(160) NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE risk ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project INT NOT NULL REFERENCES project(id), text VARCHAR(160) NOT NULL, positive BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT false, probability INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 3, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, CHECK (probability >= 1), CHECK (probability <= 9) )

CREATE TABLE effect ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project INT NOT NULL REFERENCES project(id), text VARCHAR(160) NOT NULL, impact INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 3, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, CHECK (impact >= 1), CHECK (impact <= 9) )

CREATE TABLE plan ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project INT NOT NULL REFERENCES project(id), text VARCHAR(160) NOT NULL, schedule VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE link ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project INT NOT NULL REFERENCES project(id), a VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, b VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE ranked ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, project INT NOT NULL REFERENCES project(id), rank INT NOT NULL, mnemo VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, path VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, text VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, CHECK (rank >= 1), CHECK (rank <= 81) )

CREATE TABLE agenda ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, plan INT NOT NULL REFERENCES plan(id), path VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, deadline TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL, created TIMESTAMPTZ DEFAULT now() NOT NULL )
